result.execSummary:
The defendant Santos M Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: Probation Review Hearing scheduled for October 6, 2017.

miscConds.notes:
- Defendant to pay all applicable costs, assessments and surcharges, including the DV and DNA surcharges during the period of probation. Failure to pay the costs and surcharges will result in a civil judgment.
- Pay supervision fees.

- No contact with firearms.
*Court advised defendant this may apply to this case, due to this DV conviction he may never possess firearms or ammunition.
- No contact with victim unless approved by the agent. 3rd party contact allowed for purposes of matters with the child in common.

- Complete batterer's intervention program.
- Mental health evaluation; take all prescribed medications.
- Maintain absolute sobriety.
- Attend treatment and/or counseling as determined.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Santos M Lopez in court.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Probation Agent is in court via telephone.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is not needed.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Angela D. Cunningham appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nm  
Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.  Statements by each counsel and defendant as to sentencing.

Court sentenced the defendant to serve 90 days in the House of Correction with credit for 7 days served. 
Court STAYED the sentence and placed the defendant on probation for 12 months.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
- Serve 20 days in the House of Correction; STAYED pending review.
- Complete batterer's intervention program.
- Mental health evaluation; take all prescribed medications.
- Maintain absolute sobriety.
- Attend treatment and/or counseling as determined.
- No contact with victim unless approved by the agent. 3rd party contact allowed for purposes of matters with the child in common.
- Obtain/maintain employment.
- No contact with firearms.
- Defendant to pay all applicable costs, assessments and surcharges, including the DV and DNA surcharges during the period of probation. Failure to pay the costs and surcharges will result in a civil judgment.
- Pay supervision fees.

*Court advised defendant this may apply to this case, due to this DV conviction he may never possess firearms or ammunition.
*Court DENIES request for  expungement for reasons stated on the record.

Received and filed: 
Pretrial Sentence Credit, 
Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief. 

Probation review hearing scheduled in Branch 4.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for October 6, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 6-19-2017 received and filed.
Court in trial on another matter. Case spun to branch 17, Judge Flynn for Judge Stark to proceed with plea hearing.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren. Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LNR  
JUDGE DENNIS FLYNN FOR BRANCH 4, JUDGE HANRAHAN.
Plea hearing proceeded. Negotiations placed on the record and confirmed by defense counsel and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:

The defendant was advised of his Constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Jury Instructions and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.

Jury trial on 06/21/2017 VACATED. 

Case adjourned for sentencing hearing on 06/20/2017 at 01:30, branch 4.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 20, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 6-13-2017; received and filed.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Angela D. Cunningham appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nm
Final pre-trial conference held. Parties requests plea and sentencing date prior to jury trial date. Court orders case adjourned for plea and sentencing hearing. Case remains calendared for jury trial on 6-21-2017 at 8:30am in Branch 4.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 14, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Santos M Lopez
Current: 2332 Carmen St Apt 90, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States  (Effective: 06-08-2017)
Prior: 2332 Carmen St, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 6-7-2017; received and filed.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren with Santos M Lopez. Kathryn Ginsberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed by the final pretrial date. Any 911 or other acts motion must be filed by 6-1-2017.
 Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 4.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court without counsel.  Kathryn E. Ginsberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: nm  
Indigency hearing proceeded.  Based upon the defendant's statements, the court found the defendant eligible for appointment of counsel at county expense.  The court appointed Attorney Joel Mogren to represent the defendant; Attorney Joel Mogren to be paid at the rate of $60.00 per hour.  The court ordered the defendant to repay Milwaukee County for attorney fees at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing at the close of the case.  Failure to make timely payments according to the imposed payment schedule may result in a civil judgment, subject to tax intercept.  Order signed and filed.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 8, 2017 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 21, 2017 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

ADDRESS INFO for Santos M Lopez
Current: 2332 Carmen St, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States  (Effective: 05-04-2017)
Prior: 8901 North Park Plaza Court, Apt 103, Brown Deer, WI 53223
Defendant advised No Contact/No Firearms Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Brittanie T. and Santos L. Jr.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court with attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 22, 2017 at 08:30 am.
NO REPLY FROM SURETY/DEFENDANT.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($500.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Francisco Araiza in court.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Matter set for pretrial conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Brittanie T. and Santos L. Jr.

Defendant Santos M Lopez in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Defendant Santos M Lopez in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
